name: Python & Django Cursor Rules
description: Python和Django开发的最佳实践规则集，包含代码风格、架构模式和开发规范
content:
# Python & Django Development Rules

## Code Style
- Use Black for code formatting
- Follow PEP 8 guidelines
- Use type hints for better code clarity

## Django Best Practices
- Use class-based views when appropriate
- Implement proper error handling
- Use Django REST Framework for APIs

## Architecture
- Follow the MVT (Model-View-Template) pattern
- Separate business logic from views
- Use Django's built-in security features

name: React & TypeScript Cursor Rules
description: React和TypeScript开发规则，包含组件设计、状态管理和类型安全的最佳实践
content:
# React & TypeScript Development Rules

## Component Design
- Use functional components with hooks
- Keep components small and focused
- Use TypeScript interfaces for props

## State Management
- Use React Context for global state
- Implement proper error boundaries
- Optimize with React.memo when needed

## Code Quality
- Use ESLint and Prettier
- Write unit tests with Jest
- Follow React best practices

name: FastAPI Development Rules
description: FastAPI Web框架开发规则，包含API设计、异步编程和性能优化
content:
# FastAPI Development Rules

## API Design
- Use Pydantic models for request/response validation
- Implement proper HTTP status codes
- Document APIs with OpenAPI

## Async Programming
- Use async/await for I/O operations
- Implement proper error handling
- Use background tasks when needed

## Performance
- Use dependency injection
- Implement caching strategies
- Optimize database queries

name: Next.js Cursor Rules
description: Next.js全栈React框架开发规则，包含SSR、SSG、API路由和最佳实践
content:
# Next.js Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Use the App Router for new projects
- Organize pages in the app directory
- Keep API routes in app/api

## Server Components
- Use Server Components by default
- Mark Client Components with 'use client'
- Minimize client-side JavaScript

## Data Fetching
- Use async Server Components
- Implement proper loading states
- Handle errors gracefully

## Performance
- Optimize images with next/image
- Use dynamic imports for code splitting
- Implement proper caching strategies

name: Vue.js Cursor Rules
description: Vue.js渐进式JavaScript框架开发规则，包含组合式API、状态管理和组件设计
content:
# Vue.js Development Rules

## Composition API
- Use Composition API for new components
- Use <script setup> syntax
- Organize composables in separate files

## Component Design
- Keep components small and focused
- Use props for parent-child communication
- Emit events for child-to-parent communication

## State Management
- Use Pinia for global state
- Keep reactive state local when possible
- Use computed for derived state

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript with Vue 3
- Follow Vue style guide
- Optimize with v-memo when needed

name: Nuxt.js Cursor Rules
description: Nuxt.js Vue.js全栈框架开发规则，包含SSR、静态生成和模块系统
content:
# Nuxt.js Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Use Nuxt 3 with Composition API
- Organize pages in pages or app directory
- Use composables for reusable logic

## Server-Side Rendering
- Configure SSR/SSG mode appropriately
- Use useFetch for data fetching
- Handle hydration carefully

## Auto-Imports
- Leverage auto-imports for components
- Use composables from #imports
- Follow Nuxt conventions

## Performance
- Use Nuxt Image for optimization
- Implement proper caching
- Minimize bundle size

name: Flask Cursor Rules
description: Flask轻量级Python Web框架开发规则，包含路由、模板和扩展使用
content:
# Flask Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Use application factory pattern
- Organize blueprints by feature
- Keep configuration in separate files

## Routing
- Use decorators for route definitions
- Implement RESTful routes
- Handle errors with error handlers

## Templates
- Use Jinja2 templates effectively
- Implement template inheritance
- Minimize logic in templates

## Best Practices
- Use Flask-SQLAlchemy for ORM
- Implement proper session management
- Use Flask-Migrate for database migrations

name: Laravel Cursor Rules
description: Laravel PHP框架开发规则，包含Eloquent ORM、路由和中间件使用
content:
# Laravel Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Follow Laravel conventions
- Use service providers for configuration
- Organize code in modules/features

## Eloquent ORM
- Use Eloquent relationships
- Implement proper query scopes
- Use migrations for database changes

## Routing
- Use route model binding
- Implement RESTful controllers
- Use middleware for cross-cutting concerns

## Best Practices
- Use Laravel validation
- Implement proper error handling
- Use queues for long-running tasks

name: Express.js Cursor Rules
description: Express.js Node.js Web框架开发规则，包含中间件、路由和错误处理
content:
# Express.js Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Organize routes in separate files
- Use middleware for common functionality
- Keep controllers focused

## Middleware
- Use middleware for authentication
- Implement error handling middleware
- Use body-parser for JSON parsing

## Routing
- Use router for route organization
- Implement RESTful routes
- Handle async errors properly

## Best Practices
- Use environment variables
- Implement proper logging
- Use helmet for security

name: Spring Boot Cursor Rules
description: Spring Boot Java框架开发规则，包含依赖注入、自动配置和REST API
content:
# Spring Boot Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Use Spring Boot starters
- Organize packages by feature
- Keep configuration in application.yml

## Dependency Injection
- Use constructor injection
- Leverage Spring's autowiring
- Use @Component annotations appropriately

## REST APIs
- Use @RestController for APIs
- Implement proper exception handling
- Use DTOs for data transfer

## Best Practices
- Use Spring Data JPA
- Implement proper transaction management
- Use Spring Security for authentication

name: Angular Cursor Rules
description: Angular TypeScript框架开发规则，包含组件、服务和依赖注入
content:
# Angular Development Rules

## Component Architecture
- Use standalone components
- Keep components focused
- Use OnPush change detection

## Services
- Use services for shared logic
- Implement dependency injection
- Use RxJS for async operations

## Templates
- Use Angular directives
- Minimize template logic
- Implement proper form handling

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript strictly
- Follow Angular style guide
- Implement proper error handling

name: Go (Golang) Cursor Rules
description: Go语言开发规则，包含并发、错误处理和包管理最佳实践
content:
# Go Development Rules

## Code Style
- Follow Go formatting conventions
- Use gofmt for code formatting
- Keep functions small and focused

## Error Handling
- Return errors explicitly
- Wrap errors with context
- Use errors.Is and errors.As

## Concurrency
- Use goroutines for concurrent tasks
- Use channels for communication
- Avoid race conditions

## Best Practices
- Use interfaces for abstraction
- Keep packages focused
- Write comprehensive tests

name: C# & .NET Cursor Rules
description: C#和.NET框架开发规则，包含异步编程、LINQ和依赖注入
content:
# C# & .NET Development Rules

## Code Style
- Follow C# coding conventions
- Use async/await for I/O operations
- Prefer expression-bodied members

## LINQ
- Use LINQ for data manipulation
- Avoid N+1 queries
- Use async LINQ when appropriate

## Dependency Injection
- Use constructor injection
- Register services in DI container
- Use interfaces for abstraction

## Best Practices
- Use nullable reference types
- Implement proper error handling
- Write unit tests with xUnit

name: Ruby on Rails Cursor Rules
description: Ruby on Rails Web框架开发规则，包含MVC模式、ActiveRecord和RESTful设计
content:
# Ruby on Rails Development Rules

## MVC Pattern
- Keep controllers thin
- Move business logic to models
- Use service objects for complex operations

## ActiveRecord
- Use ActiveRecord associations
- Implement proper validations
- Use migrations for schema changes

## RESTful Design
- Follow REST conventions
- Use resource routes
- Implement proper status codes

## Best Practices
- Use strong parameters
- Implement proper error handling
- Write RSpec tests

name: React Native Cursor Rules
description: React Native移动应用开发规则，包含组件、导航和性能优化
content:
# React Native Development Rules

## Component Design
- Use functional components
- Keep components reusable
- Optimize FlatList performance

## Navigation
- Use React Navigation
- Implement proper deep linking
- Handle navigation state

## Performance
- Use Hermes engine
- Optimize images
- Minimize re-renders

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript
- Follow platform conventions
- Test on real devices

name: Flutter Cursor Rules
description: Flutter跨平台移动应用开发规则，包含Widget、状态管理和性能优化
content:
# Flutter Development Rules

## Widget Design
- Use StatelessWidget when possible
- Keep widgets small and focused
- Use const constructors

## State Management
- Use Provider or Riverpod
- Avoid setState in complex apps
- Implement proper state updates

## Performance
- Use const widgets
- Implement proper list views
- Optimize build methods

## Best Practices
- Follow Material Design
- Use proper error handling
- Write widget tests

name: Svelte Cursor Rules
description: Svelte编译型前端框架开发规则，包含组件、状态管理和响应式设计
content:
# Svelte Development Rules

## Component Design
- Use single-file components
- Keep components focused
- Use slots for composition

## Reactivity
- Use reactive declarations
- Understand reactivity rules
- Avoid unnecessary reactivity

## State Management
- Use stores for global state
- Keep local state local
- Use context for component communication

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript with Svelte
- Optimize bundle size
- Implement proper error handling

name: TypeScript Cursor Rules
description: TypeScript类型安全的JavaScript超集开发规则，包含类型、接口和泛型
content:
# TypeScript Development Rules

## Type System
- Use strict mode
- Prefer interfaces over types
- Use type inference when possible

## Code Organization
- Use namespaces for organization
- Export types explicitly
- Keep type definitions close to usage

## Best Practices
- Avoid any type
- Use type guards
- Implement proper error handling

## Advanced Features
- Use generics for reusable code
- Leverage utility types
- Use conditional types when needed

name: Node.js Cursor Rules
description: Node.js服务器端JavaScript运行时开发规则，包含异步、模块和错误处理
content:
# Node.js Development Rules

## Async Programming
- Use async/await over callbacks
- Handle promises properly
- Use Promise.all for parallel operations

## Module System
- Use ES modules
- Keep modules focused
- Export only what's needed

## Error Handling
- Handle errors in async code
- Use try-catch blocks
- Implement proper logging

## Best Practices
- Use environment variables
- Implement proper security
- Use process managers for production

name: Python Cursor Rules
description: Python通用开发规则，包含代码风格、类型提示和最佳实践
content:
# Python Development Rules

## Code Style
- Follow PEP 8
- Use Black for formatting
- Use type hints

## Best Practices
- Use virtual environments
- Write docstrings
- Handle exceptions properly

## Performance

- Leverage built-in functions

## Testing

name: JavaScript Cursor Rules
description: JavaScript现代开发规则，包含ES6+特性、异步编程和最佳实践
content:
# JavaScript Development Rules

## Modern Features
- Use ES6+ syntax
- Prefer const over let
- Use arrow functions

## Async Programming
- Use async/await
- Handle promises properly
- Avoid callback hell

## Best Practices
- Use strict mode
- Avoid global variables
- Write readable code

## Code Quality
- Use ESLint
- Write tests
- Follow best practices

name: Electron Cursor Rules
description: Electron跨平台桌面应用开发规则，包含主进程、渲染进程和IPC通信
content:
# Electron Development Rules

## Architecture
- Separate main and renderer processes
- Use IPC for process communication
- Keep main process lightweight

## Security
- Enable context isolation
- Disable node integration in renderer
- Validate all IPC messages

## Performance
- Use native modules when needed
- Optimize bundle size
- Implement proper caching

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript
- Follow security guidelines
- Test on all platforms

name: Gatsby Cursor Rules
description: Gatsby静态站点生成器开发规则，包含GraphQL、插件和性能优化
content:
# Gatsby Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Organize pages in src/pages
- Use components in src/components
- Configure plugins in gatsby-config.js

## Data Fetching
- Use GraphQL for data queries
- Leverage Gatsby's data layer
- Use static queries when possible

## Performance
- Optimize images with gatsby-image
- Use code splitting
- Minimize bundle size

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript
- Follow Gatsby conventions
- Write tests

name: C++ Cursor Rules
description: C++系统级编程语言开发规则，包含内存管理、模板和最佳实践
content:
# C++ Development Rules

## Modern C++
- Use C++17/20 features
- Prefer smart pointers
- Use const correctness

## Memory Management
- Use RAII pattern
- Avoid raw pointers
- Manage resources properly

## Templates
- Use templates for generics
- Implement type traits
- Use SFINAE appropriately

## Best Practices
- Follow Core Guidelines
- Use static analysis
- Write comprehensive tests

name: Ember.js Cursor Rules
description: Ember.js约定优于配置的前端框架开发规则，包含路由、组件和数据处理
content:

## Project Structure
- Follow Ember conventions

name: Meteor Cursor Rules
description: Meteor全栈JavaScript平台开发规则，包含实时数据、发布订阅和打包
content:
# Meteor Development Rules

## Project Structure
- Organize by feature
- Separate client/server code
- Use imports for modules

## Data Layer
- Use MongoDB collections
- Implement publish/subscribe
- Secure publications

## Real-time
- Leverage reactivity
- Optimize subscriptions
- Handle latency

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript
- Follow Meteor guide
- Test with Velocity

name: YAML Configuration Rules
description: YAML配置文件开发规则，包含语法、缩进和最佳实践
content:
# YAML Configuration Rules

## Syntax
- Use consistent indentation
- Avoid tabs
- Quote strings when needed

## Structure
- Use anchors and aliases
- Organize by sections
- Keep files readable

## Best Practices
- Validate YAML files
- Use linters
- Document complex configs

## Common Uses
- CI/CD pipelines
- Docker Compose
- Kubernetes manifests

name: React Cursor Rules
description: React UI库开发规则，包含Hooks、组件设计和性能优化
content:
# React Development Rules

## Component Design
- Use functional components
- Keep components small
- Use hooks for state

## Hooks
- Use custom hooks
- Follow hook rules
- Optimize with useMemo/useCallback

## Performance
- Use React.memo
- Implement code splitting
- Optimize re-renders

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript
- Write tests
- Follow React guidelines
